page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: We sent out questionnaires to houses on our map area.Most of the people who had the leaflets replied,but a few did not.A lot did not have any occupation at all, and some were retired.Out of the replies,four people,worked in{Ashbourne}.One person in{Parwich},two were farmers,another two did not state their whereabouts of work,and seven people did not work. The jobs that people had were market traders,physiotherapists,a plastering contractor,a production sales manager, a construction supervisor,lorry driver,computer programmer,a mechanical engineer and a motor mechanic. {by ANDREW CROTON
